title: New: fait – Koto
content:
Australia has hardly been short on awesome new music in the past few months; when it comes to intelligent, atmospheric new sounds, it’s right up there at the moment.

fait, an anonymous female musician from Perth, has just released her debut track, the shimmering Koto, a startling wash of shoegaze guitars riddled with dream-pop undercurrents. Entirely instrumental, the influences are clear to hear; My Bloody Valentine, Jesus & Mary Chain and Slowdive spring to mind instantaneously alongside a whole host of post-rock outfits (God Is An Astronaut in particular), with an equally as expansive production style. Check out Koto below, and keep up with fait via Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
